title: Spiced Beetroot and Apple Soup
ingredients: ['1 tbsp butter', '1 tbsp olive oil', '220g raw beetroot, peeled and roughly chopped', '2 dessert apples, peeled, cored and cut into chunks', '1 large red onion, cut into small chunks', '1 tbsp mild curry powder', '2 eggs', '500ml vegetable stock, made with stock cubes', '4 tbsp half-fat crème fraîche']
